front.title: Media Gateway Control Protocol (MGCP) Call Flows

abstract.t: The Media Gateway Control Protocol (MGCP) organizes the communication between a Media Gateway controller, or call agent, and a Media Gateway, e.g. a Voice over IP gateway or a Network Access Server. MGCP is defined in a companion document [1]. This document provides example of MGCP usage by providing a variety of call flows, in the case of telephony and network access servers.
